attributes.action: close down the Linden Bank bail hostel in Elworth nr Sandbach , Cheshire.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Linden bank has been a used as a sex offenders unit, so they the offenders serve out whatever time they have left to serve anything up to 2 years of their prison sentance, and then they are put back into social housing in our area ,next to unsuspecting families. Linden bank is a dumping ground for up to 23 offenders at any one time and we have had lots of problems with reoffenders  being sent back to prison .We want our life back we dont feel safe anymore ,the children want their park back as the unit looks over into the park and we have a childrens creche next to the unit where  our childrens social groups are run .this place is a timebomb waiting to happen and we the people of Elworth and Sandbach have had enough as they say its TIME2GO.
